document_data.mainbody: '''''Dungeon'' issue 219''' was released in October of 2013 in online format only. It contained the following articles related to the [[Forgotten Realms]]:
document_data.The Star-Touched Grove:
: ''By [[Tyler Gelvin]], illustrated by [[Christopher Burdett]], Cartography by [[Jared Blando]].'' '''p. 25-29'''
Visit a [[druid]]â€™s grove corrupted by the [[Far Realm]].  Module for 2-6 PC's of levels 8-9.
